title: Install Docs need updating, easy_install mercurial needs gcc
body:
by **erjohan**: 
On the install page it tells me to run easy_install mercurial:
http://golang.org/doc/install.html

But easy_install mercurial requires me to have libc6-dev and gcc.

So in the "Fetch the repository section" it should say:
sudo apt-get install python-setuptools python-dev gcc libc6-dev
